TopicTitle: My screenshot! Look what became of it after I took a nap!

Articles.Content:
I went to bed after working on a kerbal kar cinematic last night and posted a work in progress screenshot before the sheep jumping over the fence transported me to slumberland.

When I awoke I saw this!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

This community never ceases to amaze

Edit: Totally hijacked a PC to fix the mobile links which were broken.

Edited August 20, 2015 by pandoras kitten
It's nice but your bros forgot to change the logo to say "Diskovery Channel" xD

So you're famous now? Hey I can say I knew you when you were just a regular Kerbal like the rest of us!

JR

Lol I am far from being famous.

Anyway I am now wondering if a Kerbal fishing series would be feasible? From robot tuna to fuel whales, the Deadliest Katches of the Kerbin seas!

Lol I am far from being famous.

Anyway I am now wondering if a Kerbal fishing series would be feasible? From robot tuna to fuel whales, the Deadliest Katches of the Kerbin seas!

The Deadliest Catch would be found on the high seas of Eve! Where one false spark could set the oceans ablaze and the Enterprise fish that lurk there be 2000 feet long and weight in at a million ton!

Discovery Channel? What is that?

Were you referring to Duna-TV?

(That's one more evidence for my Ancient Kerbals theory.)

Duna-TV, only the finest programs straight from Duna*!

*may contain a significant delay

Lol! Duna TV!

I sincerely hope Eve's oceans are not comprised of UDMH. That stuff is toxic lol
